Author: SpheneDev
Name: Sphene
Description: Through the power of Living Memory, this plugin harmonizes your Penumbra modifications and Glamourer configurations across all connected souls, ensuring endless synchronization in your shared digital realm.
Punchline: Become Endless. Return to Living Memory.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Added performance whitelist for better user management
* Users can now be added to whitelist via context menu instead of manual ID entry
* Improved performance settings with helpful user notes
* Better handling of character data for unpaired users
* Enhanced error handling for character downloads
